key.name: hack-mode-enabled
key.description: If true, enables the Hack experience

key.name: hack-icon-pulse
key.description: If true, the Hack desktop icon will pulse to attract the user.

key.name: show-hack-launcher
key.summary: Show the Hack launcher in the desktop
key.description: If true, the Hack desktop icon will be shown.

key.name: wobbly-effect
key.summary: Whether or not to enable the wobbly effect

key.name: wobbly-slowdown-factor
key.description: Slowdown factor of wobbly effect (1.0 being normal speed)

key.name: wobbly-object-movement-range
key.description: How much objects are allowed to move in the mesh. A higher range allows for a more pronounced effect.
